snippet: Jiyai Shin made a 2-putt par on the ninth playoff hole, beating Paula Creamer to win the Kingsmill Championship and end the longest playoff between two players in L.P.G.A. Tour history.
abstract: Jiyai Shin defeats Paula Creamer, winning the Kingsmill Championship in the longest playoff between two players in LPGA Tour history.
lead_paragraph: Jiyai Shin made a 2-putt par on the ninth playoff hole, beating Paula Creamer to win the Kingsmill Championship and end the longest playoff between two players in L.P.G.A. Tour history.

headline.seo: Shin Beats Creamer to End Record L.P.G.A Playoff
headline.main: Record L.P.G.A. Playoff Ends on Second Day
headline.print_headline: Record L.P.G.A. Playoff Ends on Second Day
